summary: This mod adds a ladder out of the Ragged Flagon into the well of Riften and it adds a spell which teleports you direct into the Ragged Flagon.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Dodgerblue][size=6][b]The Thieves Guild Ladder [/b][/size][/color]

[b][size=3]Description [/size][/b]

[size=2]This mod adds a ladder in the ragged flagon to quickly exit to the market of Riften without going over the Thieves guild HQ. The well is locked during the day (from 6am to 8pm) but there is a key hidden in the ragged flagon to open it anytime. You'll just have to find it :)
Also included in this mod is a teleport spell-tome which is also located somewhere in the ragged flagon, with this spell you can return anytime from anywhere.

In version 1.4 major changes were made. Well I basically rebuild the whole mod from scratch. As a result the .esp is much smaller, does not contain any dirty edits and is cleaner in general. For more information consult the change log.

[size=4][center][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PnpKCdTIIWY[/youtube][/center][/size]

A version of this mod compatible with Skyrim: Special Edition can be found here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1923/?]The Thieves Guild Ladder - Skyrim: Special Edition[/url][/size]
[color=Dodgerblue][b]==============================================================================[/b][/color]
[size=3][b]Installation:[/b] [/size]
[list=1]
[*][size=2]Use the Nexus Mod Manager (NMM).[Recommended][/size]
[*][size=2]Unpack the archive and copy/move the .esp and the scripts folder to your ".../Skyrim/Data" directory.[/size]
[/list][size=3][b]Uninstall the mod:[/b][/size]
[list=1]
[*][size=2]Use the Nexus Mod Manager (NMM).[Recommended][/size]
[*][size=2]Delete these files thievesguildentrance.esp, thievesguildteleport.psc, thievesguildteleport.pex, TGL_TimedEntrance.pex and TGL_TimedEntrance.psc![/size]

[/list][color=Dodgerblue][b]==============================================================================Â  [/b][/color]
[s][/s][b][size=3]Compatibility [/size][/b]

[list]
[*][size=4][size=2]A compatibility patch for "Open Cities Skyrim" is available! [size=4][size=2](Accidentally I named the patch-file "OSC", sorry)[/size][/size][/size][/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=4][size=2]A compatibility patch for "Opulent Thieves Guild" is available! [/size][/size]
[/list]Note: The patches run smoothly together.[size=4][size=2]
[/size][/size]
No other incompatibilities are known
Incompatibilities however will arise as soon as another mod changes following cells: RiftenOrigin, RiftenRaggedFlagon! If this happens just contact me and
I'll see if I can make a patch for it.
[color=Dodgerblue][b]============================================================================== [/b][/color]

Created by TheTruhvanor
Font in the images by Dark (darksskyrimfont)
author: TheTruhvanor

files.name: Thieves guild ladder
files.changelogHtml:
-Added Update.esm as a master file to ensure maximum compatibility with the game and to get the compatibility patches working.
-Removed documentation from TGL_TimedEntrance script to optimize file size.
-Changed the files author name from DEFAULT to The Truhvanor

Open Cities Skyrim compat. patch v.1.5.0
-Rebuild patch from scratch because of major flaws in v.1.4.0
-The patch should now be save to use I recommend updating immediately!

Opulent Thieves Guild compat. patch v.1.5.0
-First build of the patch, should work nonetheless.

files.changelogHtml:
-NavMeshes in "RiftenRaggedFlaggon" and "RiftenOrigin" were finalized so NPCs can now follow you through the ladder/well.

Open Cities Skyrim compat. patch v.1.6.0
-NavMeshes in "RiftenOriginOCS" were finalized so NPCs can now follow you through the ladder/well.
